name: Barrage of Styles
text: The diverse martial traditions of you and your allies’ backgrounds blend into a unique combination.
benefit: You gain a cumulative +1 morale bonus (maximum +4) on combat maneuver checks for each human ally who also has this feat, is threatening the same foe, and does not share an ethnicity with you or any other ally threatening that foe.
text_zh: 你和你盟友多样的军事背景构成了一种独特的组合。
benefit_zh: 每有一个拥有此专长的人类盟友，如果威胁同一个敌人，并且和你以及其他威胁该敌人的盟友不是同一个民族，你的战技检定获得+1士气加值（最大+4）
